document.full_text: japan's crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear plant has so far leaked around a tenth of the amount of radiation released in the chernobyl disaster, data showed on tuesday, leading some experts to warn of serious long-term health risks.
document.title: radiation from japan plant increasingly dangerous
lines_and_colors: japan's crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear plant has so far leaked around a tenth of the amount of radiation released in the chernobyl disaster, data showed on tuesday, leading some experts to warn of serious long-term health risks.
